name: xwp-automation
description: XWP End-to-End Automation Tests using Page Object Model

scripts.setup: npm ci && npx playwright install --with-deps && echo Setup complete! Run: npm run test:smoke
scripts.setup:env: echo Copy .env.example to .env and update with your WordPress URLs
scripts.validate:environment: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment check:'); console.log('- BASE_URL:', process.env.BASE_URL || 'Not configured'); console.log('- API_URL:', process.env.API_URL || 'Not configured'); console.log('- LOGIN_URL:', process.env.LOGIN_URL || 'Not configured');"
scripts.pipeline:info: echo Change-driven pipeline: docs=skip, pages=targeted, utils=full, config=smoke
scripts.test:specific: echo Usage: npm run test:specific -- tests/login.spec.ts && playwright test
scripts.test:folder: echo Usage: npm run test:folder -- tests/dashboard/ && playwright test

author: XWP Team
